safetyTips: We have social distancing measures in place at our shop and offer contactless payments and deliveries.
name: JOHNSON'S FRUITERERS
address: Unit G7, Atlas Business Park, Harbour Road, Rye, TN31 7TE
description: We are a family run Greengrocers of 20 years, offering fresh local produce delivered to your door or for collection at our shop in Rye Harbour.  Give us a call to place your first order, so we can make sure we offer a service tailored to you, then we have an order email address for subsequent orders.
